body:
Stop ~all Native Wild Horse, Burro, Wolf and Wild Life removals, instead remove toxic and corporate occupation from our public land & water

Return 50,000+ trapped Native Wild Horses from behind BLM and Human Prison bars, to freedom, their rightful place 
& save tax payers $90+million dollars annually a win-win

Ban Horse Slaughter & transport of horses for slaughter

Appoint Congressman Grijalva asSecretary of Interior

CLEAN UP or FIRE the B.L.M., Dept. of Ag. and U.S. Forest Service Agencies from managing wild horses, wolves and public land & water-Create Transparency&Enforce Accountability

Prioritize creating healthy range lands, seeding, rain water harvesting traps, reintroducing wild horses 2 reduce wild fire risk & instill health & harmony 4 America today and our future generations
title: REMOVE TOXIC & CORPORATE OCCUPATION from our public land & water, NOT WILD HORSES, WOLVES or WILD LIFE~(BLM& Dept of AG)
